messages.title: Working Hard for You
messages.content: Rodney Sadd says: 'I have never met a candidate with so much enthusiasm and commitment as Gareth. He is a breath of fresh air for someone with young, strong and achievable ideas. I know the pain of his orthopaedic injury well as a fellow Labour Party supporter, and I wish Gareth to make a very full recovery as personal efforts for health remains always the cornerstone.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support jobs & local businesses like Spalding's Food Heritage Centre
Back guarantees for families and catch-up tuition, protect Sure Start Centres from Tory cuts
Fight to legally binding guarantees on cancer diagnosis and access to a GP within 1 week of request
Stand up for Spalding Community Hospital
New guarantees on police response times and firm but fair immigration policies
Support guaranteeing jobs or training for those under 18s out of work for 6 months, and a guarantee for unemployed graduates

issues.education: Back guarantees for families and catch-up tuition
issues.health: Legally binding guarantees on cancer diagnosis and access to a GP within 1 week of request
issues.socialWelfare: Protect Sure Start Centres from Tory cuts

leaflet.personalStatement: My commitment to you is to champion a fairer Britain for all in South Holland and The Deepings.

contactInformation.address: James Grey, 1 Hawthorn Chase, Moulton, Lincolnshire, PE12 6GA

endorsements.endorsement: I have never met a candidate with so much enthusiasm and commitment as Gareth.
These centres are vital to improving the start children from the local community get in life
